name: Act Of Creation
description:
The game was created for the JimJam2 in a group.

Place different type of clay creatures on the map and watch their lifecycle run down. How long will your civilisation survive.  Lay back and watch the stop motion cycles hand sculpted from clay.

-Szabó Rebeka 

-Fiona Feeney

-Ádám Boruzs

-Rafael Erik Benjámin

-Prokisch Dani
